artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Author: Yashima Gakutei; Publisher: Okada Mohei; Publisher: Maekawa Genshichirō
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: light blue cover; four color images at beginning: two men chatting, while one holds a sword and dragon head; two women approaching white bearded man; man in rob behind monkey figure in robes; human figure with boar head fighting harry, bald demon with skulls around neck; pages of text follow, many punctuated with small black and white images
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Picture Book of the Complete Story of the ‘Journey to the West’ (Ehon saiyū zenden 絵本西遊全伝)
title: Picture Book of the Complete Story of the ‘Journey to the West,’ vol. 1
